BalanceIndicator.syncMessage: Balance may be out-of-date while wallet syncs with ledger.
BalanceIndicator.title: Balance

BuildGiftForm.enterPin: For this amount your PIN is needed
BuildGiftForm.errorFee: Please reserve 0.01 MOB for transaction fee.
BuildGiftForm.errorSyncBeforeSending: Wallet must sync with ledger before sending gifts.
BuildGiftForm.giftConfirmationDescription: Please check and confirm your gift intent
BuildGiftForm.giftCreated: Gift Created! Your balance will update shortly.
BuildGiftForm.mobWillBeSent: MOB will be sent to this gift card after you confirm.
BuildGiftForm.positiveValidation: A positive, non-zero amount is required to gift MOB.
BuildGiftForm.positiveValidationRequired: A positive, non-zero amount is required to gift MOB.

BuildGiftPanel.deleteDialogDescription: If this gift has been claimed, or if you do not want to store the code and value anymore, you can delete code here.
BuildGiftPanel.deleteDialogText: Deleting will not cancel the gift, and a user must claim the gift with the code.
BuildGiftPanel.description: Use this form to create redeemable gift codes with MOB inside. To create a gift code, you simply need to input the value you would like to gift. You will then be asked to confirm the contents of the gift and secure the gifts secret code.
BuildGiftPanel.manageGiftCodesDescription: When you create a gift, this wallet will store its code and value. You can click to copy at any time. If you do not wish to store the gift code anymore, you can click the trashcan icon to delete.
BuildGiftPanel.title: You can package and gift your MOB!

ChangePasswordView.description: Changing your password will change how we encrypt your secret Entropy. You should always use strong (unguessable) passwords and change them regularly.
ChangePasswordView.instructions: To change your current password, please enter your current password and your new password.
ChangePasswordView.passwordMax: Passwords cannot be more than 99 characters.
ChangePasswordView.passwordMin: New Password must be at least 8 characters in length.

ChangePinView.currentPasswordRequired: Your current password is required to set or change your PIN
ChangePinView.description: The PIN number is used as an extra safety confirmation for operations. It's required if the MOB amount is greater than a minimum value.
ChangePinView.instructions: To change your PIN or to set one, just enter the desired value below, and the minimum it applies to as well.
ChangePinView.minimumForPin: Minimum amount that requires a PIN

CloseWalletModal.closeVerifyBody: Are you sure you want to close and secure the wallet?

ConfigureMobilecoindView.daemonDescription: The MobileCoin Daemon, or MobileCoinD, is a standalone executable which provides blockchain synchronization and wallet services.
ConfigureMobilecoindView.daemonDescriptionContinued: It creates encrypted, attested connections to validator nodes who are participating in federated voting in order to get the current block height, block headers, and to submit transactions. These validator nodes are considered highly trusted due to their use of SGX, and they are used as a reliable source for block information as well as to validate and process the proposed transactions from MobileCoinD.
ConfigureMobilecoindView.panelDescription: This panel allows you to customize the behavior of MobileCoinD as well as perform some basic resets.

ConsumeGiftForm.confirmation: Gift Received! Your balance will update shortly.
ConsumeGiftForm.error13: 13 INTERNAL: transactions_manager.submit_tx_proposal: Connection(Operation { error: TransactionValidation(ContainsSpentKeyImage), total_delay: 0ns, tries: 1 })
ConsumeGiftForm.giftB58Error: Could not find gift with code.
ConsumeGiftForm.giftB58Validation: You need a valid gift code to open a gift.
ConsumeGiftForm.giftClaimed: This gift has already been claimed!

ConsumeGiftPanel.description: You may use this form to collect gift codes. Simply enter the Gift Code and confirm you want to consume the gift into your wallet.
ConsumeGiftPanel.syncMessage: Balance may be out-of-date while wallet syncs with ledger.

CreateAccountForm.acceptTerms: I have read and accept the
CreateAccountForm.acceptTermsFormHelper: You must read the Terms of Use before using the wallet.
CreateAccountForm.accountNameValidation: Account Name cannot be more than 64 characters.
CreateAccountForm.checkedTermsValidation: You must accept Terms of Use to use wallet.
CreateAccountForm.passwordMax: Passwords cannot be more than 99 characters.
CreateAccountForm.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters in length.

CreateAccountView.description: This option is best for individuals who do not have an existing account. If you have an account you would like to use, please import an existing account instead.
CreateAccountView.header: Create a new account for this desktop wallet.
CreateAccountView.overwriteWarning: It appears that this wallet is locked with an encrypted Entropy. Creating an account will override the wallet. Please ensure that you have secured your Entropy if you wish to change accounts.
CreateAccountView.title: Create Account

ImportAccountForm.acceptTerms: I have read and accept the
ImportAccountForm.acceptTermsFormHelper: You must read the Terms of Use before using the wallet.
ImportAccountForm.accountNameValidation: Account Name cannot be more than 64 characters.
ImportAccountForm.checkedTermsValidation: You must accept Terms of Use to use wallet.
ImportAccountForm.passwordMax: Passwords cannot be more than 99 characters.
ImportAccountForm.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters in length.

ImportAccountView.description: This option is best for individuals who already have MobileCoin accounts. If you do not have an account, please create a new account instead.
ImportAccountView.header: Import an existing account for this desktop wallet.
ImportAccountView.overwriteWarning: It appears that this wallet is locked with an encrypted Entropy. Importing an account will override the wallet. Please ensure that you have secured your Entropy if you wish to change accounts.
ImportAccountView.title: Import Account

LeaveMobilecoindRunning.defaultDescription: By default, MobileCoinD terminates when you exit the wallet. This setting allows you to leave MobileCoinD syncing as a background process. It is best to keep the ledger synced to avoid delays in transactions or balance fetches.
LeaveMobilecoindRunning.ternaryWillNotSync: MobileCoinD will not continue to sync when you exit the wallet.
LeaveMobilecoindRunning.ternaryWillSync: MobileCoinD will continue to sync when you exit the wallet.

LedgerStatus.localBlocksDescription: Local Blocks shows the blocks your mobilecoind has synced the ledger.
LedgerStatus.monitorBlocksDescription: Monitor Blocks shows the blocks that a specific monitor has synced. Each account has its own Monitor Blocks count. Once this value is synced, you will immediately see the effects of transactions.
LedgerStatus.networkBlocksDescription: Network Blocks represent the total blocks within the MobileCoin network. This is the value your Local and Monitor Blocks needs to hit to be 100% synced.
LedgerStatus.statusCopyBelow90: The ledger is syncing. This may take awhile.
LedgerStatus.statusCopyError: There's been an error in the ledger. Please reset the ledger at the bottom of this page.

NotFoundView.description: You should never see this page. If you do, an engineer messed up.
NotFoundView.header: 404: The page you are looking for isn’t here

ResetLedger.description: In rare cases, your local database may become corrupted and permanently out-of-sync with the ledger. If this occurs, please manually reset your ledger.
ResetLedger.resetLedgerModalDescription: Resetting the ledger will restart the wallet. You will need to re-sync the ledger from 0. The app will refresh, and you will need to re-enter your password.

RetrieveEntropyView.description: that unlocks your wallet and allows you to use MobileCoin. It is unique to your account. It is important that you never share this code. You may wish to use this code in a secure, safe manner. This wallet uses your password to store an encrypted Entropy.
RetrieveEntropyView.entropyCanBeUsed: The Entropy can be used to import your wallet in case your device is damaged or lost. It allows you to add your account to other wallets.
RetrieveEntropyView.misplacedYourEntropy: If you have forgotten or misplaced your Entropy, you may retrieve here with your password.

SendMobForm.addressRequired: A Public Address is required to send MOB.
SendMobForm.enterPin: For this amount your PIN is needed
SendMobForm.errorFee: Please reserve 0.01 MOB for transaction fee.
SendMobForm.intent: Please check and confirm your payment intent
SendMobForm.mustSync: Wallet must sync with ledger before sending MOB.
SendMobForm.positiveValidation: A positive, non-zero amount is required to send MOB.
SendMobForm.positiveValidationRequired: A positive, non-zero amount is required to send MOB.

SendMobPanel.header: Please enter the amount of MOB you want to send and the public address of the recipient.

ShowEntropyModal.description: We generated a random Entropy to create your new account. Please store this code in a secure, private manner. You will need your Entropy to import this account into other wallets.
ShowEntropyModal.header: Welcome to the MobileCoin Desktop Wallet!
ShowEntropyModal.recommend: We recommend storing your entropy in a secure manner.
ShowEntropyModal.retrieve: If you need to see your entropy again, you may retrieve it from the Settings tab with your password. However, if you forget your password or lose this device, you will need to know your Entropy.
ShowEntropyModal.yes: Yes, I have secured my Entropy

ShowRetrievedEntropyModal.description: We decrypted your Entropy and will now show you the code on your screen. Please store this code in a secure, private manner. You will need your Entropy to import this account into other wallets.

SyncStatus.error: Please see Admin Panel in Settings.

UnlockWalletView.description: Please enter the passphrase you used to secure your wallet. If you cannot recall your passphrase, you may re-import the account into your wallet using their Entropy seed.
UnlockWalletView.title: Unlock Wallet
